    Interface for a Station on the map.

      • getReachableLinks

        java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.util.Set<java.lang.String>> getReachableLinks(java.util.List<java.lang.String> types)
        Get reachable links from this stations to other stations for specific ticket types. Returns a Map with stations id as key and ticket types as value.
        Parameters:
        types - List with ticket types of a AFigure ( AFigure.getTicketTypesRemaining())
        Returns:
        Map with stations id as key and ticket types as value.
